jdbcService.sql: select ug.id, ug.started, ug.stopped, case when gr.node_id = :nodeId then false else true end, g.id, gr.role_id, gr.node_id, ug.user_id from ~group_roles gr join ~nodes n on gr.node_id = n.id join ~groups g on gr.group_id = g.id join ~user_groups ug on ug.group_id = g.id where (:nodeId is null or gr.node_id = :nodeId or (n.path like '%' || :nodeId || '%' and gr.inherit = true)) and (:roleId is null or gr.role_id = any(:roleId)) and ug.user_id = any(:userId)
